alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 17 at 11:57AM MDT until May 19 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River near Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Wood River Ketchum 8.0 7.5 Wed 11 am MD 7.4 7.5 7.8 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-182100- /O.NEW.KPIH.FL.A.0004.230517T1757Z-230519T2200Z/ /BWKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 1157 AM MDT Wed May 17 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Wood River near Ketchum. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Lowland flooding from near the SNRA building downriver into Ketchum. Property near Chocolate Gulch Road downstream to Ketchum will have flooding; Sun Peak Picnic Area flooded; Fox Creek Trailhead may be closed * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
